channel.title: Opinion: Best TF2 MVM Loadouts
channel.description:
So I wasn't really sure where to put this since it really is kinda random (at least to me)
I wanted to know what people think are the best MVM loadouts for TF2. (Prefer opinions that are based on best strategy for something like Mann Up Mode) Here is my personal opinion:
Scout: Force A' Nature, Mad Milk, Fan O' War
Soldier: Beggar's Bazooka/Air Strike, Concheror (If using Beggar's)/B.A.S.E. Jumper (If using Air-Strike), Market Gardener/Escape Plan
Pyro: stock Flamethrower, Scorch Shot, Homewrecker
Demoman: stock Grenade Launcher, Scottish Resistance, Ullapool Caper
Heavy: Brass Beast, Sandvich, Gloves of Running Urgently
Engineer: Rescue Ranger, Wrangler, Jag
Medic: Overdose, Kritzkrieg, Vita-Saw/Amputator
Sniper: Machina, Jarate, Tribalman's Shiv
Spy: Enforcer/Ambassador, Spycicle, Dead Ringer, stock Sapper

item.title: Opinion: Best TF2 MVM Loadouts
item.dc:creator: Dalek
item.description:
I use Soda popper on scout, easier to get outta the way with the jump boosts

Read full topic

item.title: Opinion: Best TF2 MVM Loadouts
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I just used whatever seemed like it would be fun. That righteous bison is pretty fun with upgrades. It’s also fun to upgrade your wrench swing speed and repair a sentry faster than they can damage it.

Read full topic
